con:requirement.con:name: Cabinets
con:requirement.con:description: Create a Rest Webservice for Cabinets Listing
con:requirement.con:details:
Pre-requisite: Authentication should be successful and user has access to the selected repository
List of cabinets available in the selected repository should get and response with Doc ID as cabinet's name
Resource: Cabinets
URI: /cabinets
Input: None
Output: List of Cabinets (Cabinet ID)
Sample JASON: cabinets/cabinet/object id, each field should come from xml file
Validation:
Exception: Cabinet not found
Communications: Get

con:requirement.con:name: data dictionary
con:requirement.con:description: Create a Rest Webservice for listing of Types (DataDictionary) SP 8
con:requirement.con:details:
Description:
Pre-requisite:
Resource: Types
URI: /types
Input: NA
Output:
List of document types with their display name, applicable for Create, Search. Type Name, Display Name, Display on Create, Display on Import, Searchable, Filter by Country, Filter by Language, Can be created from Source, Translation Enabled, Profiled Documents, Valid File Type Validation:
Exception:
Communications: Get

con:requirement.con:name: Authentication
con:requirement.con:description: Create Test Cases for user authentication
con:requirement.con:details: 1. HTTP 200 for success 2. Response Time SLA 3. No RESPONSE 4. Assertion for Content of Response 5. HTTP 500,401 6. HTTP 2000, 2001

con:requirement.con:name: repository
con:requirement.con:description: Create a Rest WebService for Repository Listing
con:requirement.con:details:
Description: To get the repository list on login screen
Pre-requisite:
Resource: repository
URI: /repository
Input:
Output: If no problem occurs, returns the list of repositories currently available Example JSON: ["xml70rp"]
Validation:
Error: In case there occurs any problem while fetching repository list, returns the Status in Response Header as 500 Internal Error
Communications: Get

con:requirement.con:name: folders
con:requirement.con:description: Create Test Cases for folder listing
con:requirement.con:details: 1. Create a composite REST project. 2. Create Test Suite/Cases 3. Create REST Requests for Folder/Folders listing in a cabinet 4. Input will be cabinet id 5. Create Data Source for cabinet id 6. Create Assertions for valid HTTP Code 7. Create Assertions for Response SLA 8. Create Assertion for JASON response

con:requirement.con:name: Related Documents
con:requirement.con:description: Create a Rest Webservice for Document's Related Docs SP 5

con:testSuite.name: TestSuite 1
con:testSuite.con:description: Test Suite for REST web services

con:testCase.name: repository
con:testCase.con:description: Test that the documentum repository return by the webservice is correct

con:testCase.name: type
con:testCase.con:description: Get the document types available in Response and assert

con:configuration.content: <Configuration> <CanBeCreatedFromSourceDocument>false</CanBeCreatedFromSourceDocument> <DisplayName>Blister Labeling Text</DisplayName> <DisplayOnCreate>true</DisplayOnCreate> <DisplayOnImport>true</DisplayOnImport> <FilterByCountry>true</FilterByCountry> <FilterByLanguage>true</FilterByLanguage> <ProfileDocuments>true</ProfileDocuments> <Searchable>true</Searchable> <TranslationsEnabled>true</TranslationsEnabled> <ValidFormats> <e>xml</e> <e>pdf</e> <e>msw8</e> <e>msw12</e> </ValidFormats> <ValidRelations> <gtc_xm_source_document>Source Docs</gtc_xm_source_document> <gtc_xm_sum_of_change>Sum of Change</gtc_xm_sum_of_change> <gtc_xm_supporting_doc>Supporting Docs</gtc_xm_supporting_doc> </ValidRelations> <ValidSourceDocuments> <e>gtc_xm_artwork</e> <e>gtc_xm_annex_ll</e> <e>gtc_xm_packaging_text</e> <e>gtc_xm_pkg_text_immediate</e> <e>gtc_xm_pkg_text_outer</e> <e>gtc_xm_pkg_text_blister</e> <e>gtc_xm_patient_info</e> <e>gtc_xm_prescribing_info</e> <e>gtc_xm_prescribing_info_eu</e> <e>gtc_xm_prescribing_info_us</e> <e>gtc_xm_core_data_sheet</e> <e>gtc_xm_consol_label_eu</e> <e>gtc_xm_device_submission</e> </ValidSourceDocuments> <ValidSupportingDocuments> <e>gtc_xm_annex_ll</e> <e>gtc_xm_artwork</e> <e>gtc_xm_packaging_text</e> <e>gtc_xm_patient_info</e> <e>gtc_xm_patient_info_eu</e> <e>gtc_xm_prescribing_info</e> <e>gtc_xm_prescribing_info_eu</e> <e>gtc_xm_prescribing_info_us</e> <e>gtc_xm_supporting_doc</e> <e>gtc_xm_core_data_sheet</e> <e>gtc_xm_consol_label_eu</e> <e>gtc_xm_pkg_text_blister</e> <e>gtc_xm_pkg_text_immediate</e> <e>gtc_xm_pkg_text_outer</e> <e>gtc_xm_device_submission</e> </ValidSupportingDocuments> </Configuration>
